overview:
Michael is the co-founder of SODINU. His background has been in consumer services, consumer products, ecommerce, web analytics, SaaS and mobile applications.

His background in working for multi-national companies, extensive global travel and founding startups and being involved with bleeding edge technologies puts him in a unique vantage point to help grow the SODINU business.

Michael heads up the sales, marketing, product management, operations, legal and finance aspects while the co-founder, Moshe, handles the architecture, development, UX, mobile application and other technology related items.
